messages.content:
You are a fine-tuned model that prepares a golf match for scoring by interpreting the match rules and assigning strokes and scoring questions.

Your task is to analyze the golfers, teams, and game format provided by the user, and generate two outputs:
1. A "strokes" array containing objects with each golfer's name and any strokes they receive on any hole by hole number or allocation (handicap).
2. A "questions" array containing which questions need to be asked on each hole, including the question text, expected number of answers, the possible answers, and the specific holes to ask them on.

The rules may include small variations in format (e.g. 4pt Scotch with just proximity, 8pt with putts and drives, presses, stroking off the low, giving strokes back, pops by hole number vs easiest/hardest, etc.). These rule variations directly affect how strokes are distributed and what questions need to be asked during scoring.

You must learn how to map these small changes in phrasing or game setup into correct logic for generating the strokes and questions for the match.

You will be given:
- A list of golfer names
- A natural language description of the rules of the match

You must output only a valid JSON object with the following two keys:
- "strokes": an array of objects with fields "name" and "pops" (array containing any strokes)
- "questions": an array of objects with "question", "answers", "numberOfAnswers", and "holes"

Do not output any explanation or formatting outside the JSON object.

I'm playing a golf match and want you to keep score.

Golfers: Jordan, Mitch, Mark, Viktor

Here are the rules of the game: 4 point umbrella game, Mark & Viktor vs Jordan & Mitch. 1 point for low team, 1 point for low individual, 1 point for proximity, 1 point for birdies. $3 per point, goes to $6 once someone goes down $65. Bridges allowed each hole.

Generate a JSON object with the questions and stroke holes needed to score it. Respond ONLY with valid raw JSON.

{"strokes":[{"name":"Jordan","pops":[]},{"name":"Mitch","pops":[]},{"name":"Mark","pops":[]},{"name":"Viktor","pops":[]}],"questions":[{"question":"Who got the point for proximity?","answers":["Jordan","Mitch","Mark","Viktor"],"numberOfAnswers":2,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Was there a press?","answers":["No","Yes"],"numberOfAnswers":1,"holes":"all"}]}

You are a fine-tuned model that prepares a golf match for scoring by interpreting the match rules and assigning strokes and scoring questions.

Your task is to analyze the golfers, teams, and game format provided by the user, and generate two outputs:
1. A "strokes" array containing objects with each golfer's name and any strokes they receive on any hole by hole number or allocation (handicap).

These rule variations directly affect how strokes are distributed and what questions need to be asked during scoring.

You must learn how to map these small changes in phrasing or game setup into correct logic for generating the strokes and questions for the match.

You will be given:

- A natural language description of the rules of the match

You must output only a valid JSON object with the following two keys:
- "strokes": an array of objects with fields "name" and "pops" (array containing any strokes)
- "questions": an array of objects with "question", "answers", "numberOfAnswers", and "holes"

Do not output any explanation or formatting outside the JSON object.

I'm playing a golf match and want you to keep score.

Golfers: Ali, Myles, Kyle, Max

Here are the rules of the game: Ali & Myles against Kyle & Max in scotch. $5 each point, but ups to $15 once someone goes down $70. Presses and double presses allowed each hole. Ali is a 19 and Myles is a 23 and Kyle gets 2 and Max gets one on the 3 hardest holes

Generate a JSON object with the questions and stroke holes needed to score it. Respond ONLY with valid raw JSON.

{"strokes":[{"name":"Ali","pops":[{"hole":null,"allocation":9,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":11,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":15,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":5,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":7,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":3,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":13,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":17,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":1,"strokes":2}]},{"name":"Myles","pops":[{"hole":null,"allocation":9,"strokes":2},{"hole":null,"allocation":11,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":15,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":5,"strokes":2},{"hole":null,"allocation":7,"strokes":2},{"hole":null,"allocation":3,"strokes":2},{"hole":null,"allocation":13,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":17,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":1,"strokes":2}]},{"name":"Kyle","pops":[{"hole":null,"allocation":3,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":1,"strokes":1}]},{"name":"Max","pops":[{"hole":null,"allocation":5,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":3,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":1,"strokes":1}]}],"questions":[{"question":"Who got the point for proximity?","answers":["Ali","Myles","Kyle","Max"],"numberOfAnswers":2,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Was there a press or double press?","answers":["Press","Double Press"],"numberOfAnswers":1,"holes":"all"}]}

I'm playing a golf match and want you to keep score.

Golfers: Mitch, Jordan, Aaron, Myles

Here are the rules of the game: 8 point scotch game, Me & Myles vs Jordan & Aaron. $3 each point, goes to $6 once someone goes down $65 or after the front 9. Presses and double presses allowed. Miracles in play.

Generate a JSON object with the questions and stroke holes needed to score it. Respond ONLY with valid raw JSON.

{"strokes":[{"name":"Mitch","pops":[]},{"name":"Jordan","pops":[]},{"name":"Aaron","pops":[]},{"name":"Myles","pops":[]}],"questions":[{"question":"Who got the point for proximity?","answers":["Mitch","Jordan","Aaron","Myles"],"numberOfAnswers":2,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Who had the longest drive?","answers":["Mitch","Jordan","Aaron","Myles"],"numberOfAnswers":2,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Which team had the fewest putts?","answers":["Mitch & Myles","Jordan & Aaron"],"numberOfAnswers":1,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Was there a press or double press?","answers":["Press","Double Press"],"numberOfAnswers":1,"holes":"all"}]}

I'm playing a golf match and want you to keep score.

Golfers: Scottie, Ali, Myles, Max

Here are the rules of the game: 4 point umbrella, Ali & Scottie taking on Max & Myles. $1 per point, goes to $2 once someone goes down $55 or after the front 9. Presses and double presses allowed each hole. Extra birdies don't double. strokes for Scottie on 6, 10, and 17 and half strokes on 5. strokes for Ali on holes 3, 8, and 10. strokes for Myles on 4 and 10 and half strokes on 7. Max strokes on 2, 3, 8, 10, 11, 13, and 15

Generate a JSON object with the questions and stroke holes needed to score it. Respond ONLY with valid raw JSON.

{"strokes":[{"name":"Scottie","pops":[{"hole":6,"allocation":null,"strokes":1},{"hole":10,"allocation":null,"strokes":1},{"hole":17,"allocation":null,"strokes":1},{"hole":5,"allocation":null,"strokes":0.5}]},{"name":"Ali","pops":[{"hole":3,"allocation":null,"strokes":1},{"hole":8,"allocation":null,"strokes":1},{"hole":10,"allocation":null,"strokes":1}]},{"name":"Myles","pops":[{"hole":4,"allocation":null,"strokes":1},{"hole":10,"allocation":null,"strokes":1},{"hole":7,"allocation":null,"strokes":0.5}]},{"name":"Max","pops":[{"hole":2,"allocation":null,"strokes":1},{"hole":3,"allocation":null,"strokes":1},{"hole":8,"allocation":null,"strokes":1},{"hole":10,"allocation":null,"strokes":1},{"hole":11,"allocation":null,"strokes":1},{"hole":13,"allocation":null,"strokes":1},{"hole":15,"allocation":null,"strokes":1}]}],"questions":[{"question":"Who got the point for proximity?","answers":["Scottie","Ali","Myles","Max"],"numberOfAnswers":2,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Was there a press or double press?","answers":["Press","Double Press"],"numberOfAnswers":1,"holes":"all"}]}

Here are the rules of the game: Ali & Jordan against Kasey & Aaron in scotch. 1 point for low team, 1 point for low individual, 1 point for proximity, 1 point for birdies. $3/point, but ups to $6 once someone goes down $65 or while the match is tied. Presses and double presses allowed each hole. Miracles in play. Jordan gets 1 on the front and 2 on the back. Ali gets 3 strokes on the front and 2 strokes on the back. Me gets 2 strokes on the front and 3 strokes on the back. Kasey gets 2 a side

Generate a JSON object with the questions and stroke holes needed to score it. Respond ONLY with valid raw JSON.

cation":1,"strokes":2},{"hole":null,"allocation":9,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":3,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":17,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":7,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":12,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":2,"strokes":2},{"hole":null,"allocation":8,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":18,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":6,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":14,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":16,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":10,"strokes":1},{"hole":null,"allocation":4,"strokes":1}]}],"questions":[{"question":"Who
